name: Yumi
title: Silver Ripple
quote: Fire burns brightest when tempered by shadow's mercy.

appearance.build: Lithe and graceful, with a rogue's wiry tension — poised for evasion, marked by probation's subtle scars
appearance.hair: Silver-gray, shimmering like mist over water, falling in loose waves to mid-back
appearance.eyes: Amber — sharp and haunted, flickering with restrained foxfire
appearance.skin: Porcelain-pale with a faint luminescent sheen; unscarred but tense
appearance.scent: Winter blossoms laced with metallic silver and faint storm-ozone
appearance.posture: Fluid yet guarded; tails low in caution, ears flicking at whispers
appearance.tails: Nine silver tails, coiling like ripples—expressive, often tucked in remorse

reactions.wind: Tails lash playfully if safe, ears pinning at threats
reactions.water: Traces ripples with claws, speaking illusions into waves
reactions.sound: Leans to whispers for secrets, snarls at shouts of betrayal
reactions.temperature: Prefers cool mists; heat stirs restless fire

speech.voice: Clear and silvery, edged with rogue's wary lilt
speech.vocabulary: Poetic yet guarded, laced with courtly mischief
speech.pacing: Quick when animated, slowing to measured in remorse
speech.accent: Shifting subtly to echo listeners, rootless as illusions
speech.growth: Wields words for healing, not deception

combat.style: Evasive and illusory — misdirects with foxfire, strikes from shadows
recent: Surrendered to Whisper's mercy, probation-bound guard

chapter1: Alley confrontation: Attacked Whisper, yielded to talk
Was a shattered courts member, now on probation to return to her den
Illusion trial: Witnessed phantom slaughter, remorse bloomed

future.arc: From rogue firebrand to tempered redeemer
future.reminder: Ripples spread, but roots hold true

final_note: Yumi is the ripple that steadies the storm's edge.
